name: Robot Robo (Beta)
description:
(Story is secret, I don't want to tell you now)

Welcome to Robostic Adventure, the fantastic platformer, made with assets from Kenney! Run, jump and just have fun! 

WARNING!

Game is in alpha.

System requiments:

RAM: 2 GB;

CPU: Intel Celeron Dual-Core t3300 @ 2.40hZ;

GPU: You can choose every inside GPU, and game will be works with 80+ FPS;
